name: jetBlue Full Flight: Boston to Washington DC - Embraer E190
description:
A full length, full flight video with JetBlue Airways onboard Embraer 190 N197JB, operating flight B61089 from Boston to Washington National Airport on June 22 2018.

THUMBNAIL: Thanks to Ben's Photography https://www.flickr.com/photos/sandiegoplanespotter/

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTS!

Our flight today begins outside the terminal at Boston's Logan International Airport, home to jetBlue Airways,  We enter the terminal and make our way through TSA screening.  We head for our gate where today's flight is waiting for us.

We board the aircraft and take our seat in 21A.  Before long we push back and start making our way to runway 9.  We depart on a beautiful clear afternoon getting some great views of Massachussetts and Rhode Island as we make our way south.  Soon the weather closes in and we endure a bumpy ride through stormy conditions as we fly overhead New York City and make our way towards Washington.  The weather remains cloudy for much of our flight and we eventually start our descent towards Washington.  We emerge from the clouds as we join our final approach to runway 1 at Reagan National Airport.

After landing, we taxi to the terminal and disembark, making our way through the terminal to the kerb side.

Airline: jetBlue Airways
Flight: B61089
Aircraft: Embraer 190 N197JB
From: Boston (BOS)
To: Washington (DCA)
Departure: 16:27
Arrival: 17:38
Flight Time: 1:11
Seat: 21A



#inflightVideo #FullFlight #FullFlightVideo
